loan.name: Hojibobo
loan.use: to expand his business to improve his family's well-being.
loan.description:
This bright man is Hojibobo, age 29 and married with two children. He has a specialist higher education and is a kind and responsive person. He's been working in animal husbandry and agriculture for a decade as the primary source of income for his family.

He has everything needed to keep livestock on his property. Thanks to his hard work, he has a growing farm with several cows. Thanks to the cows, he sells organic milk every day.

He's asking for a loan from Kiva partner IMON to purchase two cattle to expand his business and improve his family's material well-being. Hojibobo awaits your help.
loan.whySpecial: It supports low-income female farmers while minimizing interest payments.
